channel.title: Black screen loading please wait
channel.description: when i go on a certain server it stucks on the black screen only with one acc it does it.it lets me on with other accs except 1....and don't say start a new acc..cause am admin on it :(

item.title: Black screen loading please wait
item.dc:creator: @Joe3614 Joe3614
item.description:
@Joe3614 wrote:

Deleting your account is the only way to fix this. Deleting your account wont stop you from being an admin, unless you edited your character text file. And even if you do delet it, when the server makes a new one, it’s easy to make yourself an admin

Read full topic
